extDescription.message: Замена стандартной стартовой страницы на Ваше выбранное изображение. Новая вкладка, где ничего не мешает.

ntpSourcesText.description: Link to the extension's information page and image sources

settingsLabelOverlayDarken.description: Settings - 'Darken:' setting label (how much image should be darkened)

settingsMessageOptimize.description: Settings - 'Optimizing image...' message (when image is too big it will be resized)

settingsMessageUnableToOptimize.description: Settings - 'Unable to optimize an image' message

settingsMessageUnableToValidate.description: Settings - 'Unknown image format' message appears when user selected an unsupported or corrupted image
